### Welcome to my personal website!

I am a Kenyan currently living in Belgium as a student at [Hasselt University](https://www.uhasselt.be), enrolled into  Master of Science degree in Statistics and data science, specializing in Biostatistics. When not in class or coding, I enjoy body workouts, running and beer sampling.

I hold an undergraduate BS Applied Statistics degree from [Maseno University](https://www.maseno.ac.ke/index/) having previously held roles in data management and analysis at [Kemri-Wellcome Trust](https://kemri-wellcome.org/)
